QuestData.Title: Sandscraper's Treasure
QuestData.Description: Inside this weathered stone chest at the back of Stonescraper's lair, you find a curious artifact.$B$BShaped like a beetle, its surface is a smooth, brilliant blue, lined with gold. It looks mechanical, but unlike anything you've seen crafted by mortal hands, and very old.$B$BMegs will probably be interested in this.
QuestData.RewardText: You found that in the ogre den? That's...$B$B...nothing to get excited about, I'm sure! I'm sure it's just...a perfectly benign trinket...that I'm going to give you precisely detailed instructions on exactly how to handle.$B$B<Megs drops her voice to a whisper.>$B$BKeep your voice down and don't wave that thing around.
